subject: Mental Health
title: Antidepressant Medications
description: A quick, practical guide to Antidepressant Medications.

hook.text: The first antidepressant was discovered in 1952 when a tuberculosis drug made patients euphoric.

buildup.text: SSRIs like Prozac revolutionized treatment by being safer than older drugs.

discovery.text: They increase serotonin availability, but the full mechanism is still debated.

twist.text: Antidepressants work for about 60 percent of patients â€” not a magic cure.

climax.text: Finding the right medication often requires trying several over many months.

punchline.text: The pill helps, but finding the right one takes patience.
